mapper.select:
SELECT sc.user_id as userId,u.nickname as userName,sc.user_level as userLevel,sc.first_share_num as firstShareNum, sc.second_share_num as secondShareNum,sc.create_date as creatDate,sc.remark FROM wwq_share_count sc LEFT JOIN wwq_user u ON u.id = sc.user_id WHERE sc.delete_flag = 0 AND u.delete_flag =0
and u.nickname like '%${userName}%'
